components.label: Do you work in San Francisco?
components.description: This means you currently work in San Francisco at least 75% of your working hours.

components.label: Is there someone else you'd like to authorize us to contact if we can't reach you?

components.content: By providing an alternate contact, you are allowing us to discuss information on your application with them.

values.label: I don't have an alternate contact

components.content: Let us know how to contact your alternate contact.
We'll only use this information to contact them about your application.
Choose an address where they can receive updates and materials about your application.

validate.customMessage: Please enter a valid zip code.

components.content: There are lottery preferences for people who already have special certificates.
If you have not heard of these preferences, you most likely do not have one.

components.label: Certificate of Preference (COP)
components.description:
If you hold a Certificate of Preference (COP) from the former San Francisco Redevelopment Agency. COP holders were displaced by Agency action generally during the 1960s and 1970s.

Find out more about this preference

components.label: Displaced Tenant Housing Preference (DTHP)
components.description:
If you hold a Displaced Tenant Housing Preference Certificate (DTHP). DTHP Certificate holders are tenants who were evicted through either an Ellis Act Eviction or an Owner Move In Eviction, or have been displaced by a fire.

Find out more about this preference

components.content: Good news! You qualify for a higher ranking in the lottery.
Just upload valid proof of this address and we'll also give you Live in San Francisco Preference.

components.label: Live in the Neighborhood
components.description:
You said someone in your household lives in the same neighborhood as the listing.

Neighborhood Resident Housing Preference means at least one household member lives within the same Supervisorial District or within a 1/2 mile buffer of the project.

Find out more about this preference

components.label: I don't want this preference
components.description: You'll still have the opportunity to claim other preferences.
